snippet: A judge legalized same-sex marriage in Monroe County on Thursday, siding with gay couples in the Florida Keys who said the state’s ban, approved by voters in 2008, is discriminatory and makes them second-class citizens.
abstract: Florida Judge Luis M Garcia legalizes same-sex marriage in Monroe County, siding with gay couples in Florida Keys who say state’s ban, approved by voters in 2008, is discriminatory and makes them second-class citizens; ruling only applies in Monroe County.
lead_paragraph: A judge legalized same-sex marriage in Monroe County on Thursday, siding with gay couples in the Florida Keys who said the state’s ban, approved by voters in 2008, is discriminatory and makes them second-class citizens.

headline.main: Florida: Judge Legalizes Gay Marriage in One County
headline.print_headline: Florida: Judge Legalizes Gay Marriage in One County

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
